headline: Winter Paralympics: GB skiing guide Katie Guest withdraws after positive Covid test
sentences: Defending Paralympic champion Menna Fitzpatrick has been dealt a blow before the Beijing Winter Games after her skiing guide Katie Guest was forced to withdraw because of Covid.
